Method.name: DownloadStream
Method.summary: Downloads the resource with the specified URI as a .
Method.param: A containing the URI to download.
Method.exception: The address is in the blacklist.
The time-out period for the request expired.-or- An error occurred while processing the request.

Method.name: DownloadData
Method.summary: Downloads the resource with the specified URI as a array.
Method.returns: A array containing the downloaded resource.
Method.param: A containing the URI to download.
Method.exception: The address is in the blacklist.
The time-out period for the request expired.-or- An error occurred while processing the request.

Method.name: DownloadString
Method.summary: Downloads the specified resource as a .
Method.returns: A String containing the specified resource.
Method.param: A containing the URI to download.
Method.exception: The address is in the blacklist.
The time-out period for the request expired.-or- An error occurred while processing the request.
